content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  November 12 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has placed Molson Coors Brewing  Company's (Molson Coors) long-term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) and senior  unsecured ratings at all Molson Coors entities on Rating Watch Negative. The  rating actions follows the announcement by Molson Coors that it has entered into  a definitive agreement with Anheuser-Busch InBev SA/NV (AB InBev) to purchase  SABMiller plc's (SABMiller) 58% stake in MillerCoo

title: Fitch Places Molson Coors on Rating Watch Negative

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  March 11 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed the Issuer Default Rating  and corresponding issue-level ratings of Molson Coors Brewing Company (Molson  Coors) and its related entities at 'BBB' and 'BBB/F2'. The Rating Outlook is  Stable. A complete list of rating actions is provided at the end of this  release. Molson Coors had approximately $3.2 billion of total debt at the end of  2014.
